doc.title: Fallout: Coming Home from the War in Iraq
doc.plot: Staff Sergeant James C. Bailey, Corporal Michael Prysner, and Staff Sergeant Charlie Carlson are three very different people, but each shares a common experience - the war in Iraq. Together these three veterans recount their experiences in the war and share the challenges they faced both in Iraq and returning home to a nation that is unaware of the harsh reality on the ground in Iraq. 'FALLOUT: Coming Home from the War in Iraq' is not just another documentary about the war in Iraq. These firsthand witnesses explain how their experiences have affected them and altered their views on the war, the media, the public, and the leaders who put their lives on the line.
